actionConfiguration.body:
select title,name,
created_time,
SUM(cast(total_video_views as decimal)) as Total_Video_Views,
SUM(cast(total_video_view_total_time as decimal)) as Total_Watch_Hrs,
SUM(cast(total_video_impressions as decimal)/1000) as Revenue
FROM public.smg_dmp_fb_video_dashboard_unq_view
where view_date >= '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
  AND view_date <= '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date
	AND created_time >= '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}'
  AND created_time <= '{{End_date.selectedDate}}'
			AND name like {{Domain_select.selectedOptionValue ? Domain_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
			and name is not null
group by title,name,created_time
order by Total_Video_Views desc
limit 100
